title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message:
I have a 2015 MacBook Air that runs "fine" other than the fan runs high as soon as you turn it on.

When it boots, Keyboard, trackpad, wifi, Bluetooth, etc.. all work the way they should (and doesn't seem to be running slowly.) I've looked over the board and don't see liquid damage (doesn't look like it's been cleaned either)

Usually I would run ASD to see if it fails any sensors, but I don't have an ASD for the 2015 air, and what I was reading online is that Apple has gone remote/GSX for their "ASD" for the newest machines.

Can anyone confirm this or know what would cause (I'm sure there are a thousand things) the fans to run on high?

Thanks!

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message: Hold down "D" and start the machine, it will run onboard diagnostics.

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message:
Throws back PFM006 (SMC) and PPN001 (Power management system)

any ideas? Thanks for the hint about holding down D

thank you

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message:
And the machine's powers from battery and/or charger just fine. If the computer works this well, other than fan, would you suspect a bad SMC? PPN001 power management, I did just see some corrosion on the I/O board. Don't have a spare. Could an I/O board be causing all of this. The 820-00165-A looks super clean (there was some dust, etc... so I don't think it was cleaned)

thanks again

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message: Yes, fin stack temp sensor is on IO board going through pin 11 and 13 of J9500.

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message:
Okay, awesome. I'll replace the I/O and the cable and reportback.

thanks again!

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message: Replaced the IO board and cable and no more loud fan! Running that self diag again to see if anything pops up anymore.

title: [SOLVED]2015 MacBook Air 820-00165-A Fan runs High all the time
message:
ADP000 "No issues" ✔️

Feel free and close this topic, thanks!!!
